<h3 id="X21620">X(21620)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: WASAT AND INCIRCLE-CIRCLES</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^3+(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<p class="bold">
X(21620) = X(1)-3*X(3475) = 3*X(1)-X(3486) = 3*X(1)+X(9613) = X(388)+3*X(3475) = 3*X(388)+X(3486) = 3*X(388)-X(9613) = X(1697)+3*X(4654) = 9*X(3475)-X(3486) = 9*X(3475)+X(9613) = X(4294)-3*X(10389) = X(4295)-3*X(4654) = X(9579)+3*X(10389)</p>
<p>X(21620) lies on these lines:

<p>
X(21620) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 388}, {1697, 4295}, {4294, 9579}<br>
X(21620) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (958, 1125), (3927, 18249)<br>
X(21620) = X(388)-of-anti-Aquila triangle<br>
X(21620) = X(1181)-of-incircle-circles triangle<br>
X(21620) = X(1181)-of-Wasat triangle<br>
X(21620) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 226, 946), (1, 1478, 950), (1, 3476, 13607), (1, 3485, 13464), (1, 5270, 10572), (1, 5290, 4), (1, 9612, 497), (1, 10106, 5882), (1, 12047, 12053), (1, 13407, 226), (226, 12053, 12047), (388, 3486, 9613), (497, 9612, 18483), (1058, 5714, 1699), (12047, 12053, 946), (12608, 13464, 946)<br>
